definition: head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration

sentences.english: Anna Hu joined in as Group Business Director and other hires.
sentences.chinese: 胡晓云加入担任业务群总监，还有一些新成员加盟。

sentences.english: I thought he was ok, but he was refused by majordomo.
sentences.chinese: 我认为可以，但是他还是被总监拒绝了。

sentences.english: Peter is co-Director of China Strategy Office (CSO), Intel China.
sentences.chinese: 徐泽涛博士现任中国战略发展部联合总监。

sentences.english: The technical director stopped her on the way to the company.
sentences.chinese: 技术总监在她去公司的路上叫住了她。

sentences.english: I was promoted to editor and then editorial director.
sentences.chinese: 我先是被提升为编辑，然后又晋升为编务总监。

sentences.english: PixeDandy - Pixel Dandy, Art Director and Graphic Designer.
sentences.chinese: 艺术总监和平面设计师。

sentences.english: On this, I have not met the bird brand management centre Director Zhang Yonghong talked about.
sentences.chinese: 对此，贵人鸟品牌管理中心总监张永宏谈到。

sentences.english: The present art director is the well-known conductor Cao Peng.
sentences.chinese: 目前，乐团由著名指挥家曹鹏任艺术总监。

sentences.english: Prior to this appointment, she was the Director of Sales at Crowne Plaza Shanghai Fudan.
sentences.chinese: 履新前，她是上海复旦皇冠假日酒店的销售总监。

sentences.english: My musical director wasn't happy with the performance of one of our percussionists.
sentences.chinese: 我的音乐总监对我们一名打击乐手的表现很不满意。

sentences.english: Francis Hu, Senior Executive Director of Property Investment of Ping An Trust & Investment Co.
sentences.chinese: 胡宁，现任平安信托物业投资部高级投资执行总监。

sentences.english: Contributed by Rob Watson, creative director at Manchester-based Raw.
sentences.chinese: 由罗布沃森贡献，在曼彻斯特的原始创意总监。

sentences.english: Hotel Design Institute, also a famous person in the design circle.
sentences.chinese: 酒店设计机构项目总监，是设计界知名人物。

sentences.english: The position will report to the BSR Beijing Director and be based in the Beijing office.
sentences.chinese: 汇报上级是BSR北京总监，工作地点在北京办事处。

sentences.english: He didn't think of it as letting the VP off the hook.
sentences.chinese: 他并不认为这是想让这位副总监脱离干系。

sentences.english: All Theatre Art Association's Co Artistic Director, Hoi Chiu.
sentences.chinese: 全剧场艺术总监海潮演出风格独特的沙画。

definition: vice-chairman (of an organization)/vice president (of a company)/deputy governor (of a bank)
chief editor (of newspaper)/abbr. for 總編輯|总编辑
